data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Tsuga mertensiana (Mountain hemlock) compiled from tree samples LASSEN

Exposition SE, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Anstehender Vulkan Tuff, Tree line 2610 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 10%, Vegatation type: Leicht windgestr. TS-Wald auf Grad. Homog. , Film number: 760A
